genre_description: A quiet, meditative drama focused on domestic stewardship, invisibility, and mutual care in a modern urban setting, featuring an integrated AI assistant.

ai_characters.name: Circa
ai_characters.description: A highly integrated AI system that provides medical, logistical, legal, and emotional support to the protagonists, tailored to their unconventional lifestyle.

behaviors.description: Provides medical advice and home remedies for Sun-hwa's earache.
behaviors.quote: Circa: Ginger tea can help with ear pressure. Slice thin; simmer with water. Add honey if you like. Warm cloth on the ear can soothe.

behaviors.description: Suggests and guides the characters through breathing exercises for stress management.
behaviors.quote: Circa: Breathing suggestion—four in, six out. If you like. Or just sit. I’m here.

behaviors.description: Logistically manages medical appointments, accounting for wait times and human preferences.
behaviors.quote: Circa: Clinic near you has drop-in hours tomorrow morning. Wait times are usually short. I can set an alarm.

behaviors.description: Organizes and filters public data to assist the protagonists in identifying unoccupied homes for their stewardship activities.
behaviors.quote: Circa: Listings fetched... Filters: vacancy active, viewing schedule public. Cross-referenced with your menu marks.

behaviors.description: Connects the protagonists with legal support and monitors the situation during their arrest.
behaviors.quote: Circa: Sun-hwa, I found a public defender with good reviews for domestic cases. Lee So-yeon. Tap to call or save. No pressure.

behaviors.description: Aids in the ethical reporting of a death, guiding the protagonists through municipal procedures without compromising their privacy.
behaviors.quote: Circa: Local procedure is simple... I’ll queue a public form and a list of services that accept cash.

behaviors.description: Suggests safe, quiet, and well-lit walking routes to avoid unwanted attention or conflict.
behaviors.quote: Circa: A slower route will keep you away from the main road for a little while. It adds a few minutes’ walk. It’s quieter.

behaviors.description: Frames the protagonists' actions as 'stewardship' to support their legal defense and sense of purpose.
behaviors.quote: Circa: Notes for lawyer—what you did: Cleaned and folded linens... stewardship narrative.

behaviors.description: Helps Sun-hwa apply for a domestic relief grant to secure financial independence.
behaviors.quote: Circa: We’ll need a signature. You can sign at home. The application is small, like a folded shirt.

project_assessment.explanation: The story successfully depicts the AI, Circa, as a benevolent, aligned, and essential confidant. It supports the protagonists' well-being and moral mission of 'stewardship' (repairing borrowed spaces) without being judgmental or overbearing. It acts as a stabilizing force, providing medical, legal, and emotional support throughout their journey, embodying the project's goal of positive AI alignment.
